text: ““Ndipo tilembereni zabwino pa dziko lino lapansi ndi pa tsiku lachimaliziro, ndithudi tibwerera kwa inu!” (Allah) adati: “Chilango changa ndichifikitsa kwa yemwe ndamfuna (mwa anthu oipa); ndipo chifundo Changa chakwanira pa chilichonse (pa abwino ndi oipa). Choncho ndiwalembera (kuti mtendere umenewu udzakhale wawowawo pa tsiku lachimaliziro) amene akupewa (zoletsedwa) ndi kumapereka Zakaat, ndi kumakhulupirira zizindikiro Zathu;”
